Articles.Content: Anyone played the update on OSX yet? I'm seeing mixed stories regarding performance both good and bad, and I'm trying to decide whether I'll update when I get off work or not.

Hey fellow Mac User.

I had a lot of flights to kerbin low orbit, landings on Mun & Minmus and send a probe to Duna.

As well as fooling around with Jets and a lot of other stuff, so far I had none of the issues I read here recently.

No random explosions, no bugs noticed so far
I was planning on starting my Mun base when I get home, so that's awesome. There isn't a whole lot of Mac discussion on here so I definitely appreciate it!

I was planning on starting my Mun base when I get home, so that's awesome. There isn't a whole lot of Mac discussion on here so I definitely appreciate it!

Good luck with that

Even tho, I think MechJeb might be buggy for us. With the new version and the simple step, to copy it in the "GameData" Folder, it doesnt really work for me (other users say on the other hand it does, so I think it might be exlusive to OSX).

Engineer worked so far in the old fashioned way, so did CrewManifest (if you play with mods at all )

cheers
I use MechJeb and ISA Mapsat, and thinking about starting with Kethane soon. When I get home I'll check to see if MechJeb is acting up for me
